_aLatestUpdates._sText: I actualised my current readme.txt file.

In this update I have remade all soundtracks at this map to get smaller filesize (success) and I only remade the finish before entering the room and after entering the room. At before entering room I removed the stupid flammes, PlayerClip blocks and the tracks at where lasers moved (<- because the lasers hadn't pointed at the teleport anymore). At after entering the room I added Light System to get the party feeling and some spark-entities at the ground. Also I closed the room from the open-air. I hope the map is now better for you somehow.

_sText:
LEGO COURSE - ALEXXT

NOT RECOMMENDED FOR MONSTREUS BUNNYHOPPING SERVERS!

MiniGame

WALKTROUGH (v1)

Properties

  • Map Version: V2.0 (Original/Final)
  • Working Progress: 2 weeks
  • 4 secrets exist on the map
  • map in lego style (see the map name)
  • spawn protection in 30sec (kills on one hit)
  • course difficult: very hard (because large)
  • on win player gets 250 points(frags)
  • all winners can get the points(frags)
  • 4 cuted musics plays at Spawn, 4 original musics plays at finish
  • some standart commands have been enabled on this map

  • finish nice designed
    Required

  • The map need a NoBlock to work properly.
    Music

  • Flo Rida - Whistle (Pi Red BeatZ Bootleg) House Remix 2012
  • Taio Cruz (feat. Flo Rida) - Hangover (House Mix) [Mixed by DJ Nelsmann]
  • Maroon 5 - Payphone (Steven V & Alvo Remix)

  • Mike Candys ft. Patrick Miller & Evelyn - 2012 (If The World Would End) (DJ FM Bootleg Remix)
    Enabled Commands Overview

Enabled Commands Overview shows you all enabled commands of this map.

mp_round_restart_delay 4
mp_roundtime 9.0
mp_freezetime 2.0
sv_gravity 800
sv_enablebunnyhopping 1
sv_airaccelerate 1000

Special Thanks

  • BoHaRoX - Lego Textures
  • Vitaskorp - Testing

  • Jackmaster - Music help
    Bug Reports

Please report all bugs on GameBanana comments page.
Changelog

To read all changes pls watch in Updates section



Please leave comments, rate, give feedback and subscribes if you like.


THIS IS MY LAST MG COURSE MAP(WITHOUT HELPING ETC).

IF YOU LOSE AT MY MAP DON'T CRY, BECAUSE I TOLD YOU!
